The Reds have made a perfect start to the season with five wins from five under new manager Arne Slot. arts.ttl: Crystal Palace vs Liverpool – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Crystal Palace welcome Liverpool to Selhurst Park on Saturday for a top-of-the-table clash where they will be looking to make history. Oliver Glasner’s side are currently on a 17-match unbeaten run across all competitions. Avoiding defeat against the reigning champions would see them equal their all-time club record of 18 matches without a loss. arts.sum: “We know we are able to create chances and to score goals, and when you have this proven over many months, this gives confidence to the team.
